body: I'm trying to build a package which depends on `octave`, which depends on `ncurses` (via `readline`).  However, including the `ncurses` header files apparently breaks compilation of my package ... what's the nicest way that these headers shouldn't be propagated?  (I'm thinking of something like Nix's `nativeBuildInputs, buildInputs, propagatedBuildInputs`).
title: How to prevent transitive dependencies from being added to include path?
